link.title: International Academy of Saginaw

a.title: Budget and Salary / Compensation. Transparency Reporting

div.a: Budget and Salary / Compensation. Transparency Reporting

h1.strong: Welcome to the International Academy of Saginaw!

article.p: The International Academy of Saginaw is a highly regarded institution that provides a high-quality education to a diverse population in the Saginaw area. IAS strives to help all students to achieve their full potential, prepare them for success in college, equip them with the ability and desire for lifelong learning, and strengthen their civic, ethical, and moral values. IAS maintains high standards of efficiency and accountability throughout its operation.

p.strong: FREE BREAKFAST will be served daily from 7:30 a.m. – 8:00 a.m.
IAS is currently accepting applications for Kindergarten thru Grade 8 for the 2019/2020 school year!

article.p: To apply, visit IAS or call (989) 921-1000 to request an application to be mailed to you. All applications must be accompanied by all required documentation as listed on the enrollment form.

a.strong: REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL EDUCATIONAL SERVICE PROVIDER

article.p: All applicants must carefully read each of the sections below for critical information regarding the 2020 RFP and are strongly encouraged to contact the International Academy of Saginaw Board President with any questions or concerns about this information prior to completing a proposal.

div.p: SABIS® is a global education network that has an active presence in 20 countries on five continents.
SAGA is the alumni association serving thousands of SABIS® alumni around the world.
The SABIS® Careers website features job openings from across the global SABIS® Network.

div.h5:
International Academy of Saginaw Closed
School Closure

div.p: The International Academy of Saginaw building will be closed for the remainder of this school year. Additional updates on continuing education will be shared as they are available.

For further information please contact us on:
